The correct answer is A: He uses the Acrobat option to create a PDF, a Save As dialog appears to name it “Conference 2017.pdf,” and he verbally notes “it’s creating that” followed by “and there it is there.”

In the audio, the presenter mentions using the Acrobat option to convert the Word form into a PDF. He also describes a Save As dialog appearing on the screen, where he names the file as "Conference 2017.pdf." The presenter verbally confirms the creation process by saying "it's creating that" and then "and there it is there," indicating the successful completion of the conversion. None of the other options match this sequence of events described in the audio.
